title: Subprocess Handling — PyTorch 2.9 documentation
text:
## Subprocess Handling#

Created On: Mar 08, 2024 | Last Updated On: Mar 08, 2024

## Retrieve SubprocessHandler#

SubprocessHandler

## SubprocessHandler#

Convenience wrapper around python’ssubprocess.Popen. Keeps track of
meta-objects associated to the process (e.g. stdout and stderr redirect fds).
subprocess.Popen
